name: Flail Hockey - Enhanced!
description:
In 2017 I released Flail Hockey, a local-multiplayer only air hockey game made with GameMaker where you rotate the player's arm joints instead of moving the paddle.

It was broken. Pretty bad. The physics were unresponsive, the controls were too slippery, and there was no option to play against a computer opponent.

But now, all of those issues have been amended! Check out these features:

  • Keyboard & controller compatible
  • Much better 'game feel' - be more in control than ever before with tighter controls and consistent physics
  • Play with two human players, one human & one computer, or just watch two computers battle it out
  • Cohesive sound design

This was mostly a project just to familiarize myself with Godot, but I hope it ends up being a fun time for you!
